title: Azerbaijan central bank holds refinancing rate at 7%
description:
Azerbaijan's central bank said on Wednesday it was keeping its key refinancing rate at 7%.

The interest rate corridor would remain unchanged, with the lower limit set at 6% and the upper limit at 8%, it added.

title: Azerbaijan approves 2026 unemployment insurance fund budget at 266.4 million manats
description:
